Sangam Chouchan

Hi, nice to meet you

Curious as an explorer, risk taker as a child, I envision the world as a big playful canvas.
Filled with the drive to always learn more, my interests have been always pluridisciplenary. From physics, films, to designs, I believe that deep understanding comes from putting different subjects into unity.
Half French, Half Japanese, and now a student at Mcgill university, this cross-pollination of culture advised me the power of understanding other: empathy.

Jump into experience and learn progressively
on the way
